name: MyBlend#4
description: Prompt: For MyBlend#4, first I would like to mix together a 12-30% of A1 with A2, then I would like to take 20-40% of the resulting blend and mix it with 10-60% of B, choosen from Bx or By. Finally, I would like to add the Solvent as the third component

children.name: Solvent
children.description: fill the rest of the blend with the solvent
